HomeCourt calculates metrics like shooting percentage, accuracy, release time, dribble speed, vertical jump and more. You can even use Apple Watch to track your heart rate and save your data to HealthKit. 

ENGAGE IN FUN, INTERACTIVE DRILLS
Using HomeCourt is less like training and more like a video game. The immersive live-action experience is powered by AR (augmented reality), with virtual targets, audio cues, bonus levels, points and badges—it’s like you’re inside the game. Now practicing skills is engaging, not boring, so you’ll stick to it and improve more. 

LEARN FROM THE PROS
HomeCourt is an official partner of the NBA and provides access to the expertise of the most elite players in the game today. Train with interactive drills and instruction from NBA and WNBA athletes. Learn their moves and even compete against them in interactive challenges. 

COMPETE WITH FRIENDS
Don’t workout alone, compete virtually with your friends, family, and teammates. You can join a virtual Team on HomeCourt, or create your own Team for free. You can also challenge a friend or teammate to any HomeCourt activity with a time-shifted “Battle Mode” that matches you up head-to-head. As you compete in Battles, you collect trophies, badges, and coins, just like you would in a video game. Earn rewards and level up together.

SHOWCASE YOUR SKILLS
Engage in unique showcase activities and even get discovered directly by the NBA. Participants who opt-in to NBA Global Scout are eligible to receive invitations to select NBA tryouts, camps, tournaments, and showcases. As you build your profile on HomeCourt, you can also share your progress with individual coaches and scouts.

--
SET UP
HomeCourt is ready to use everywhere you bring your iPhone or iPad. No special basketballs, uncomfortable sensors, or expensive equipment is required. Just set up your phone with a clear view of the court and starting training and competing through HomeCourt.

PRICING
• Free: Access the full library of 100+ drills and activities. Get unlimited shot tracking.
• HomeCourt Plus: Access your full workout history, get complete skill ratings, join the members-only training club, request feedback from HomeCourt pro trainers, participate in HomeCourt Global Camp, and create up to 4 user profiles.

Here Is What You Need To Do
1. Make a profile on Playerfy.
2. Create or join a team.

6. PLAY FOOTBALL! 

Once you have finished playing there is more you can do. You can:
1. Rate users
2. Track your feedback

Why Playerfy?

No Team? Not Enough Players?

3. Manager - Create a team and manage it.

Advantages of Venue and Field Owners/ Managers

Shearwater Cloud links your mobile device to your Shearwater dive computer. It allows you to download and manage your dive logs, update your dive computer firmware, and use cloud storage.

Using Bluetooth LE technology, you can quickly and easily download your dive logs to Shearwater Cloud. Once your logs are downloaded, you can analyze your depth, decompression profile, temperature, and much more.

The defining feature of Shearwater Cloud is the ability to store your dives via the cloud. Cloud storage provides accessibility to your dives on any mobile device with an internet connection. In addition, dive logs can be recovered should the dive logs be lost on a local storage.

Shearwater Cloud is compatible with Peregrine, Teric, Perdix 2, Perdix AI, Perdix, NERD 2, Petrel 3, and Petrel 2.

The G-Sight Shooters Club Mobile Application takes dry-fire training to the next level, allowing you to safely train when you can't get to the shooting range. This app will record your laser shots so you can review your performance and improve your technique. You can use g-sight targets for different missions and automatic scoring, or go to quick practice to use your favorite paper targets.


After making absolutely sure firearms are unloaded and no live ammo is in your training area, align the target edges as closely as possible to the screen edges and press next. The app will then guide you through set up and calibrate. After selecting your drill parameters if applicable (mission and shooting distance), return to your shooting position and wait for the audio prompt to begin training. When your session is complete you can review your trace and drill parameters. Press the “Retry” button to restart the same drill. 


Tips:

-Avoid bright light, especially sunlight on or near the target. If you see large patches of light reflecting off the target in your phone screen, you may encounter detection issues.

-Avoid using damaged targets. Creases on the target, or on the edges of the target may reflect light as well. For optimal results, we recommend that the 4 corners of the target lay flat on the wall.

-Avoid having constantly changing lighting such as shadows on or near the target.

-Avoid shaking/nudging the phone/target while in a drill session.

-Phone should be placed within a yard of the target.


This app is intended for use with ALL dry fire laser training cartridges and systems including the G-Sight branded ELMS, ELMS PLUS, Quantum XG and Gen 2 training lasers as well as most any red laser training cartridges available today.
